description:
Natsumi is a second year middle school student in the tennis club. She`s a bright, energetic, and honest girl. Since she was raised by a single mother, she`s used to helping out with household chores, and takes good care of her younger brother, http://anidb.net/ch43034 [Daiki]. She lives next to http://anidb.net/ch38837 [Saki], and they`ve been friends since they were young, so they`re a pair in the tennis club.
Source: ANN
name: Aizawa Natsumi
